author: arfrever
msg: Don't build libsvn_subr_kwallet when support for KWallet is disabled.
targets when support for KWallet is enabled.

author: hwright
msg: Update checksum-returning functions to use the same semantics as are typically
used in our codebase, namely accepting double pointers as output parameters, and
allocating the output in the provided pool.
(file_checksum_args, base_file_checksum): Use a double pointer to return the
(txn_body_file_checksum): Remove the check on requested checksum type, since
we're just returning whatever type we have.
(make_fulltext_rep): Simply use a duplicate of the rep's checksum, instead of
(svn_fs_base__rep_contents_checksum): Use a double point to return the
Use a double pointer to return the checksum, update docstring.
fs->pool instead of the checksum's pool.
(svn_fs_base__dag_file_checksum): Use a double pointer to return the checksum.
(svn_fs_file_checksum): Use a double pointer to return the checksum, update
(svn_checksum_t): Remove the pool member, previously used for duplication.
(svn_checksum_dup): Redefine in the style of other duplication functions.
Take a pool parameter, and allocate the duplicate in that pool and return it
(root_vtable_t): Use a double pointer to return the checksum from the
(svn_fs_file_checksum): Use a double pointer to return the checksum.
(svn_fs_file_md5_checksum): Update to the new svn_fs_file_checksum() API.
(fs_file_checksum): Use a double pointer to return the checksum, simplifying
